Plot: On his latest expedition, Dr. Rick Marshall is sucked into a space-time vortex alongside his research assistant and a redneck survivalist. In this alternate universe, the trio make friends with a primate named Chaka, their only ally in a world full of dinosaurs and other fantastic creatures.
Title: Land of the Lost
Writer: Chris Henchy, Dennis McNicholas, Sid Krofft (television series), Marty Krofft (television series)
Actors: Will Ferrell, Anna Friel, Danny McBride, Jorma Taccone
tomatoConsensus: Only loosely based on the original TV series, Land of the Lost is decidedly less kid-friendly and feels more like a series of inconsistent sketches than a cohesive adventure comedy.
